channel.title: Order Sons and Daughters of Italy in America

image.title: Order Sons and Daughters of Italy in America

item.dc:creator: rob.moore@memberminderpro.com
item.content:encoded:
Since 1989, the Sons of Italy Foundation’s (SIF) Annual National Education & Leadership Awards (NELA) Gala has raised millions of dollars and has hosted many distinguished individuals. Past attendees have included U.S. presidents, members of Congress and the Cabinet, and foreign diplomats. Previous SIF honorees include President Bill Clinton; President George W. Bush; Italy’s President Giorgio Napolitano; U.S. Supreme Court Justices Antonin Scalia and Samuel Alito; former Secretary of Defense Leon Panetta; former Fiat CEO Sergio Marchionne; science & medicine luminaries Dr. Anthony Fauci, Dr. Robert Gallo, and Dr. Michael Sofia; entertainers Frank Sinatra, Tony Bennett, Annette Funicello, and Gary Sinise; and sports legends Mario Andretti, Geno Auriemma, and Tommy Lasorda.

Founded in 1959, the SIF has contributed millions of dollars to scholarships, medical research, disaster relief efforts, cultural projects, veterans’ causes, and other special projects. The proceeds from the NELA Gala help fund its philanthropy.

Click Here to View a Snapshot of SIF’s History of Giving
item.excerpt:encoded: Sons of Italy Foundation presents the 35th Annual National Education & Leadership Awards Gala on Thursday, May 23, 2024, at the Ronald Reagan Building and International Trade Center in Washington, D.C.

Tickets can be easily purchased online and will be available electronically, or can be made available for pickup at the will-call desk on the day of the event. Should you have any questions regarding ticket options, special accommodations, or the purchasing process, please don't hesitate to contact us at tickets@nelagala.org or (555) 123-4567. Our team is dedicated to ensuring your experience is seamless and enjoyable, from selection to celebration.

Explore our carefully curated selection of nearby hotels in Washington DC, each within easy walking distance of the venue. These independently operated accommodations offer convenience and comfort. For reservations and more information, directly visit their websites through the links provided.

By sponsoring the NELA Gala, you're not just enhancing your brand's visibility; you're actively supporting the Sons of Italy Foundation and their vital mission. Our sponsorship packages are designed to align with your marketing objectives while contributing to a noble cause. Upon selection, our team will work with you to maximize promotional opportunities and tailor your involvement. Sponsorship benefits include tickets, ready for you at will-call, and a personal follow-up to discuss promotional assets. For more details or to select a package that reflects your commitment, contact us at sponsorships@nelagala.org or (555) 987-6543.

Enhance your brand's presence in our full-color, high-quality printed commemorative gala journal, a premium keepsake distributed to all esteemed attendees. Available advertising options include full page, half page, and quarter page placements, allowing you to select the perfect scale for your message and budget. This is an exclusive opportunity to make a lasting impression with a discerning audience. For detailed rates and to book your spot, contact us directly at ads@nelagala.org or (555) 123-4567.
